alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fort Bend and south central Harris Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Willowbend, or over Bellaire, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Missouri City, Stafford, Bellaire, West University Place, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, University Place, Astrodome Area, Meadows Place, Southside Place, Westbury, Braeswood, Westwood, Central Southwest, Willowbend, Alief, Sharpstown, Meyerland Area, Gulfton and Fifth Street. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
